nodes.text: A zoo was a location dedicated to holding a collection of rare and, sometimes, dangerous creatures. The King Prana and his rival, Regent Solculvis, both had expansive zoos dedicated to their collections of animals. Prana, particularly, enjoyed boasting about his zoo. Capital City on Lothal had a zoo, which Ezra Bridger had visited.
In 2 BBY, Emperor Palpatine owned a personal zoo that housed many rare and exotic animals.
Prior to Liberation Day in 5 ABY, the Wexley family visited a zoo at Sarini Island on Chandrila, which contained pangorins, caw-crabs, and uralangs.

Some 30 years after the Battle of Endor, Prana sought to outdo his rival and hired the smuggler Han Solo to obtain rathtars for his zoo, which ultimately went unfulfilled despite paying top credit for the job.
